title: Track Critical Material Delivery
description: A project expediter needs to track the status of a shipment of custom-fabricated steel to ensure it arrives on time.

tasks.description: Find the purchase order for the custom steel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct purchase order.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier to get the latest status and the shipping/tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with the supplier and gets the tracking information.

tasks.description: Use the tracking number to get the latest location from the freight carrier and update the project's material tracking report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the shipment's current location and updates the project records with the new ETA.
